short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT... The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure 1 Golf Cart - 6 passengers for delivery to CFB Edmonton.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT... The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure 1 Golf Cart - 6 passengers for delivery to CFB Edmonton.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Golf Cart Procurement

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the procurement of one golf cart, with a seating capacity of six passengers.

#### Request for Proposal (RFP)

* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-246866/A
* **Publication Date**: April 18, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 20, 2024 2:00 PM (EDT)

#### Requirements

The DND requires the delivery of a golf cart to CFB Edmonton within 120 days of contract award. There are no security requirements associated with this procurement.

#### Criteria for Selection

The procurement will be awarded to the supplier offering the lowest price.

#### Contact Information

If you are interested in responding to this RFP, please contact:

Mylène Faguy
DLP 5-3-2
Phone: (000) 000-0000
Email: [mylene.faguy@forces.gc.ca](mailto:mylene.faguy@forces.gc.ca)

#### Documents

To view the RFP documents, please visit the following links:

* [English RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36341/en-rfp--w8476-246866-a-original.pdf)
* [Français RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36341/fr-ddp-w8476-246866-a-original_0.pdf)

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any future procurements. All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Notes: Never use cursives in your source code.
